meanings.sent1: She was hesitant to try the new food.
meanings.sent2: He is always hesitant to speak in front of a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: The hesitant puppy cautiously approached the unfamiliar toy.
meanings.sent4: The hesitant driver slowly navigated through the busy intersection.
meanings.sent5: The hesitant student nervously raised her hand to ask a question.

meanings.sent1: The hesitant customer took a long time to decide on a color.
meanings.sent2: The hesitant response indicated a lack of commitment.
meanings.sent3: The hesitant squirrel debated whether to approach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her hesitant smile revealed her inner turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The hesitant explorer cautiously stepped into the dark cave.
